My name is Ania Kujawa. I started to learn programming in 2018 from playing a little with Golang and React. I decided to focus on frontend technologies and after months of self-teaching I got to CodersCamp course. I've finished the course and started to work in a software house, which was my big dream. Now I am frontend developer focused on React but ready to try new things.
